Package ibo1.Client

Class IRCClient

java.lang.Object
ibo1.Client.IRCClient
public class IRCClient extends Object
IRCClient - Interactive Robot Chess Client class is responsible for the communication with the Interactive Robot Chess Server, which is run within a ROS system on a Linux machine.
Version:
0.1 ( Initial development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
Author:
Omar Ibrahim
See Also:
  • DataChecker

  • Constructor Details

    • IRCClient

      public IRCClient()
      Creates a default Constructor where ip address and port are predefined and set.

    • IRCClient

      public IRCClient(String ipAddress, int port) throws InvalidDataException
      Creates a new Client.IRCClient
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - IPv4 address to connect to
      port - port to connect to
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - thrown by invalid IPv4 address

    • IRCClient

      public IRCClient(String ipAddress, int port, boolean autoConnect) throws IOException, InvalidDataException
      Creates a new Client.IRCClient and connects automatically
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - IPv4 address to connect to
      port - port to connect to
      autoConnect - automatically connects to the server
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by connecting to server
      InvalidDataException - thrown by invalid IPv4 address

      Read ipAddress property.

    • getPort

      public int getPort()
      Read port property.
      Returns:
      port

    • setIpAddress

      public void setIpAddress(String ipAddress) throws InvalidDataException
      Sets ipAddress property. Further it checks if ipAddress is correctly formatted.
      Parameters:
      ipAddress - IPv4 address to connect to
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - thrown by invalid IPv4 address

    • setPort

      public void setPort(int port)
      Sets port property.
      Parameters:
      port - port to connect to

    • send

      public void send(ProtocolObject sendData) throws IOException
      Sends data to the clientSocket as a byte array.
      Parameters:
      sendData - Protocol Object to be sent.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by OutputStream write

    • receive

      public ProtocolObject receive() throws IOException
      Receives data from the clientSocket as a byte array and returns a protocol object. Current version has no timeout build in. This needs to be expanded on in the future.
      Returns:
      returns the read buffer as a byte array
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown by InputStream read

    • openConnection

      public void openConnection() throws UnknownHostException, IOException
      Tries to connect to the IRCServer.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - throws an UnknownHostException
      IOException - throws an IOException

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection() throws IOException
      Tries to disconnect from the IRCServer.
      Throws:
      IOException - throws an IOException
